access_collections_from_some_your_favour: Access collections from some of your favourite star players & clubs in the fastest growing leagues in the Middle East and Africa.

earn_digital_collectibles_memorabilia: Earn Digital Collectibles, Memorabilia and enter prize draws and raffles for exclusive items.

to_access_the_sphera_World_platform: To access the Sphera World platform you'll need to create an account and will be provided with a wallet to manage your digital collectibles and tokens.
